definition: for all eternity/throughout all ages/eternity (used in an elegiac couplet, wreath etc dedicated to the dead)
a single slip may cause everlasting sorrow (idiom)
pinyin: yi1 shi1 zu2 cheng2 qian1 gu3 hen4

definition: a good reputation to last down the generations

sentences.english: Welcome to a world where you shape the epic sagas that will be told to future generations.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎來到這個留芳千古的史詩傳奇般故事的世界。

sentences.english: And so we ask ourselves. Will our actions echo across the centuries ?
sentences.chinese: 於是我們問自己，我們所作所爲是否會千古留名？

sentences.english: And we shall experience love stories that will last forever.
sentences.chinese: 我們還將會體驗到千古不朽的愛情故事。

sentences.english: Her brave decision reverberates through history as an example to us all.
sentences.chinese: 她的勇敢決定作爲我們大家的榜樣而名垂千古。

sentences.english: Guyaju, an thousand year mystery of the human heritage.
sentences.chinese: 古崖居，一個千古之謎的人文古蹟。

sentences.english: They will write stories about your victories for thousands of years.
sentences.chinese: 人們將會爲你的勝利撰寫傳奇，流傳千古。

sentences.english: Time is inclined to change those unfavorable memories into imaginary perfectness .
sentences.chinese: 時間將一些原來並不美好的記憶幻化成千古的完美。

sentences.english: Ma Ying-jeou, is candidate for the Man of Never Dies.
sentences.chinese: 馬英九，流芳千古的候選人。

sentences.english: Nothing much to say, but lot of things to think.
sentences.chinese: 千古罪人事件？當年那會想那麼多。

sentences.english: A fall into eternal hate, back in one hundred.
sentences.chinese: 一失腳成千古恨，再回頭是百年人。

sentences.english: The five lakes tour, the worry everywhere, Floating and sinking through the ages, and who asked the east?
sentences.chinese: 落日五湖遊，煙波處處愁。浮沈千古事，誰與問東流？

sentences.english: The resulting masterpiece was the Admonitions Scroll.
sentences.chinese: 於是，就有了千古名作《女史箴圖》。

sentences.english: Blessed are the eunuchs, for they shall obtain an everlasting name.
sentences.chinese: 做太監的人有福了，因爲他們必名垂千古。

sentences.english: She was with the rabbit, a silk belt around eternal love.
sentences.chinese: 玉兔伴嫦娥，絹帶千古繞相思。

sentences.english: It is not correct to guess that there is pessimism and passive attitude in this poetic masterpiece through the ages.
sentences.chinese: 不可以消極悲觀的情緒與觀點去理解這首千古佳作。

sentences.english: The yellow stone old man return, the water is cool to still see stay the , the historical records your work is historic.
sentences.chinese: 黃石老人去不還，水涼猶見留侯影，史記大作炳千古。

definition: since the dawn of time/from the year dot
since ancient times/it has ever been the case that/see also 自古以來|自古以来[zi4 gu3 yi3 lai2]
(of one's name, reputation etc) to be immortalized (idiom)/to leave a mark for generations to come
a good reputation to last down the generations
incomparable/none to compare with at that time
